name: White Album 2: Introductory Chapter
summary: "White Album 2" is a Japanese adult visual novel, taking place in the same setting as its predecessor with approximately ten years having been elapsed since the events of the first White Album. The introductory chapter follows Haruki Kitahara and Takeya Iizuka troubled over the fact that all the band members they gathered for the school festival have left. After a bit of hard work, Setsuna Ogiso and Kazusa Touma are recruited into the club. With Haruki, the three of them play together at the school festival. They perform Yuki Morikawa's "White Album", When the day draws to an end, Setsuna finds Haruki and then confesses to him and the two of them start going out together...
